html:
2025-0927
2025-12-11TCCanada Shipping Act, 2001Vessel Traffic Services Zone RegulationsVessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations in order to (1) repeal the Vessel Traffic Services Zones Regulations, the Eastern Canada Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations, and the Northern Canada Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations, and consolidate their requirements under the new Regulations; (2) standardize reporting requirements across all Canadian vessel traffic services zones; (3) incorporate by reference, on an ambulatory basis, the part of the Radio Aids to Marine Navigation that includes technical details and specifies the data elements and format for vessel reports; (4) make several technical and administrative amendments to standardize terminology and harmonize existing requirements with international standards; (5) amend the Administrative Monetary Penalties and Notices Regulations by designating 26 provisions as violations.Registration: SOR/2025-0275 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations
precis: Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations in order to (1) repeal the Vessel Traffic Services Zones Regulations, the Eastern Canada Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations, and the Northern Canada Vessel Traffic Services Zone Regulations, and consolidate their requirements under the new Regulations; (2) standardize reporting requirements across all Canadian vessel traffic services zones; (3) incorporate by reference, on an ambulatory basis, the part of the Radio Aids to Marine Navigation that includes technical details and specifies the data elements and format for vessel reports; (4) make several technical and administrative amendments to standardize terminology and harmonize existing requirements with international standards; (5) amend the Administrative Monetary Penalties and Notices Regulations by designating 26 provisions as violations.
